freeTrial.description: Upload company data, operational logs, or regulatory documents to see how our AI automates compliance reporting for GDPR, CSRD, and ESG requirements.

freeTrial.trialUsedDescription: You've already used your free trial. Please upgrade to a paid subscription to continue.

features.title: Everything You Need for EU Compliance
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive platform covers all major EU regulations with intelligent automation and expert-designed workflows.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: Automated data protection impact assessments, consent management, and privacy reporting.

csrd.title: CSRD Reporting
csrd.description: Streamlined Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive compliance with automated data collection.

esg.title: ESG Metrics
esg.description: Comprehensive Environmental, Social, and Governance reporting with real-time dashboards.

ai.title: AI-Powered Automation
ai.description: Machine learning algorithms that adapt to regulatory changes and optimize reporting processes.

risk.title: Risk Assessment
risk.description: Proactive compliance risk identification with automated alerts and remediation suggestions.

multi.title: Multi-jurisdiction Support
multi.description: Navigate complex EU regulations across different member states with localized compliance rules.
